name: Shadow of the Eternals
description:
Shadow of the Eternals is an action game developed by Precursor Games.
Shadow of the Eternals is available on PC.
Kenji Miki and Satoru Iwata produced the game. It was directed by Denis Dyack, Hiroyuki Yamada and Tatsuya Hishida. It was scored by Denis Dyack and Steve Henifin.
